    • searchByOptions

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> searchByOptions(@RequestParam(name="tag",required=false) List<String> tags, @RequestParam(name="name",required=false) List<String> names, @RequestParam(name="description",required=false) List<String> descriptions, @RequestParam(name="mode",required=false,defaultValue="1") boolean mode, @RequestParam(name="sort",required=false) Set<String> sorts)
      Search certificates by filter params.
      Parameters:
      tags - the certificate names
      names - the certificate names
      descriptions - the certificate descriptions
      mode - the search mode (1 - full complete/0 - part of request)
      sorts - the sort type (NAME,DATE/ASC,DESC | Ex. NAME_ASC, DATE_DESC)
      Returns:
      the certificate objects
